name: Amy G
text: I used to visit the Richmond location fairly often so I was already aware of this chain restaurant. Visited the sterling location last year and wasn't really impressed. But just took my daughter out to dinner here again earlier today and ‚Ä¶More

name: Tia Storey
text: Great food, beer, and service!

name: John Lilly
text: This is a fairly new pizza place in Chantilly, and we really enjoyed our first visit! The food was fresh and very filling. Our server was friendly and outgoing, but the service was a little slow (probably because they‚Äôre new). I‚Äôm sure over time it will improve. Definitely recommend as an alternative to Mod or carry-out!

name: Sylvia Lee Velez
text: Food is amazing and the staff is beyond friendly and sweet !  I ordered from uber eats & no drivers were around to pick up the food and drop it off before they closed and one of the employees  ( Danny left a voicemail, then a young woman ‚Ä¶More

name: Reony Tonneyck
text: Nice location, and Covid logistics are well put in place. Never crowded when we go, and plenty of spacious seating. Food is always great. We like the hawaiian pizza. The vibe is kinda lacking here though, since this area is so baron still. ‚Ä¶More

name: Melissa Groves
text: We love mellow mushroom and now cannot say enough about them. We placed an order through a third party app (UberEats). It took over 2 hours for them to arrive to the restaurant, while our pizza just sat there ready for delivery. Upon ‚Ä¶More

name: Sierra McClure
text: Very good, also very filling. Had great customer service here, as well. I think our waiter was named Josh? Something with a J, but he's awesome!

name: Dori Colbert
text: This is some deliciousness for your soul!!!  The crusts is so full of flavor.  I will visit here often!!! I love it!!!

name: Gary Ginseng
text: Great atmosphere and fun place to visit. Always great service! Lady who manages the bar really knows beer. She will talk your ear off about beer if she isn't busy, but all the bartenders are so friendly and knowledgeable as well. The pizza is amazing too. Have to try the Holy Shiitake if you go, and the pretzel bites.

name: Ruben dos Santos
text: Pizza was great and great selection of beers. Amy the manager made sure to check on how things were and provided excellent customer service as well as the server. Will be coming back for sure!

name: Karen Orellana
text: Server was GREAT. She was on top of everything! suggested great beers. Loved her blue hair!

name: Cathy Smith
text: I ordered 10 wings today and got 6 in a carry out order. The ones I got were good but I‚Äôm frustrated that I paid for 10. I called back to let them know they need to quality control the kitchen and got placed on hold or hung up on.

name: Michael McClelland II
text: Great food and beer as usual. Staff was fairly rude and inattentive this visit.

name: Ty Horn
text: Great pizza with creative specials. Important note: pizza reheats very well.

name: James Wills
text: Great salads and great service. Outdoor seating.

name: Drew Nelson
text: Great selection of toppings and a delicious crust make their pizzas some of the best I've had. They also have a killer beer selection and live music on the weekends„ÄÅ what more could you want in a pizza place?

name: Jacob Mathers
text: Mellow Mushroom was amazing! The atmosphere of the restaurant was very unique, with propellers hanging from the ceiling! Alex, our waiter, was one of the best we've had. He was very attentive and maintained a professional but friendly ‚Ä¶More

name: Jeanie Bridwell
text: We're from Raleigh and we're stoked to find a Mellow Mushroom in Nova. Pizza is just as delicious here. Great beer selection, family friendly, outdoor seating. Highly recommend!

name: Peter Siemsen
text: Mellow Mushroom has some of the best pizza in the Fairfax area!  The crust makes the pizza and Mellow Mushroom has some of the crispiest and most flavorful crust in the area!  The atmosphere is very pleasant, there's usually kids running ‚Ä¶More

name: Tom K
text: Great food and excellent service! The local beer selection was top notch and the ability to create your own pizza or salad provided great options. Will definitely be back!

name: Sarah Deavers
text: This was my first time at this location and I was surprised how upscale the atmosphere felt for a pizza restaurant. Thing is, the pizza isn't just pizza- it's my favorite!! We ordered two pizzas- the Mighty Meaty and the Holy Shiitake Pie- ‚Ä¶More

name: Darryl Gomez
text: Great service, great drinks and food!

name: Lauren G.
text: Outstanding service, beer selection and good happy hour deals! My server Courtney was so sweet and helpful. I came in to grab an app and try some beers while studying on my laptop on a week day and everyone was so understanding. The bar ‚Ä¶More

name: Alicia
text: It was my first time trying out this pizza spot. It was amazing ! Worth every minute. I loved how well done the pizza was. I also tried the cheese and it was amazing. Not a big fan of pizza chains but it was worth it. Vincent made the whole experience even better. Best customer service ever!

name: Morgan Sigsbee
text: Mellow mushroom is one of those gems that you don't appreciate until you have been brought there by chance, or an excited friend. "Oh you have never been there before!? Well, that is changing today!" Not only do they have a wide and ‚Ä¶More

name: Stumper 00
text: Short wait for outside dining. Staff was friendly and pizza had lots of flavor

name: Lilly S
text: Great customer service and delicious pizza. Get the Kosmic Karma.

name: carson kennedy
text: Very nice and hard working employees. Service was great and food was ready fast.

name: Dan Miksch
text: Nice place, clean, good service. Food is reasonably priced. Pizza is best option, as it should be, but salads and soup were also very good. Definitely a decent option in the area. They also have a very good beer selection.

name: Peggy Fowler
text: Excellent atmosphere and good pizza. A bit pricey, though.

name: Joon Kim
text: Mellow mushroom is usually good but past two takeouts were really disappointing. Last order the Holy Shiitake had just globs of aioli and had to scrap it off. Then this time tried to create a Margherita pizza and it‚Äôs came out looking really sad. Probably my fault for trying to order Margherita here.

name: Kimo
text: One of my favorite pizza places in the area. Especially enjoy the great white (add chicken). Ingredients are fresh and I particularly enjoy the yeast dough they use with their pizzas.

name: michael fahey
text: This is the slowest Mellow Mushroom on earth.  Twice, just months after the restaurant had opened we had experiences where our food took an indescribable amount of time to come out.  We decided not to go here anymore after having similar ‚Ä¶More

name: Shelby Brown
text: Food was great ! Our server Danni was amazing ! :)

name: Jack Yu
text: Good service, plenty of outdoor seating cause Covid. Decent beer selection on tap. Pizzas can be a bit (imo) overflavored, but people who like that like it. Dough is nice with lots of body and texture. Their pizza reheats really well in the toaster over for some reason. Prices are about right for the area.

name: Fawn K
text: Veg Out Pizza w/ VEGAN Cheeze is THE BEST!! Their hummus is delicious too ü§©ü§©

name: andrew lester
text: 0 stars if that was an option my girlfriend called in to order at 6:40 and was told it would take 45 minutes and when arriving was told it would be a "little bit longer" and went ahead and paid and waited in her car. She called back at 8:10 ‚Ä¶More

name: John Franklin
text: Fun place, great beer selection, excellent Pizza, killer crust!

name: Manuel Weaver
text: I celebrated my PhD yesterday in this great place. happy to tell that we had a great evening and the place was indeed one of the reasons for the happy celebration. The team  helped in a graceful style, the meals were great and my guests were so  pleased. We shall absolutely visit again for more joyful events. thanks very much.

name: Steve Burkhart
text: $$$... And worse yet the brownie was only half the size it was claimed to be  ,,, but the üçï pizzas were delicious!!ü§ó

name: Cas S
text: Good location. Very friendly staff. Creative menu. Soup was good. However, my pizza was cold and dry. It was closing time so I hope that was the problem. Would I go back again. Maybe one day but I'm in no rush.

name: Gabriel Garcia
text: Pizza and calzones were really delicious.  The restaurant is really clean and has a great atmosphere.  There is bar seating and outdoor seating with televisions in both areas.  If you are a huge fan of the restaurant, they sell merchandise in the front. Overall, great food and dining experience.

name: Bill Kirby
text: I recently retired after 24 years of Federal Government service.  My team came up with Mellow Mushroom as a place to have a  retirement Happy Hour.  I had been to Mellow Mushroom before for their pizza, but never for any sort of social ‚Ä¶More

name: Mikey Wanzer
text: It was a quiet evening when me and my friends went. We were a group of 8 and they were happy to accommodate. It was slow so service was quick at the time we went. Drinks were good, food was fresh. Only issue I had was the rotation the ‚Ä¶More

name: Stevie K
text: Mellow mushroom always has good pizza every time I go. Never have been disappointed! It truly is pizza üçï of pure deliciousness!  My favorite flavor is called a great Great white. ‚Ä¶More

name: Erich Minyard
text: I love this place. Best pizza anywhere

name: Tiff Cruz
text: We had an absolutely amazing time. The beer was great with more than ten options on tap. The pretzel bites are very tasty and were served very hot. The white pizza was bomb! Every ingredient was fresh and piping hot. The ambiance was loud due to socializing and the patio space was cool too. 10/10

name: Maxton Banks
text: Had a awesome experience in this spot with my girlfriend. The food came quick and the service is just great. Prices are affordable.

name: Zachary Stone
text: I love Mellow Mushroom. But after trying their delivery option tonight, I learned I‚Äôll never do that again!! ‚Ä¶More

name: BA R
text: Requested ALL FLATS bc it was an option & didn‚Äôt get all flats (see pic w/ receipt).  Sad. But manager Amy said they would credit us for the mistake. :)

name: Ekta Dhaka
text: Great place with variety of pizza, pies, calazones.. Food was yummy..

name: Ronald De Leon
text: Hummus with flat bread, wings and strawberry lemonade was very good. They also had a full bar with plenty of different beers available on tap. New building with good lighting and TVs all around to give you that almost pub kind of feel. The ‚Ä¶More

name: Anh Tuan
text: The menu and service were ahead of our expectations. I really enjoyed the environment of this place. Great restaurant to take my family out for dinner.

name: Sandra Busey
text: My first experience with Mello Mushroom was in Richmond. I loved it so much and was so happy to see one in Chantilly. Getting takeout on the 5th for our anniversary since we are old and are in Corona prison by our children! Hmmmmm....now what to get!! Five ‚≠êÔ∏è ‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏èFood!!

name: Michael Uy
text:
I only ordered the appetizers. Buffalo wings and meatball skewers.

The rest of the very large party I was just with did order a bunch of pizzas and ‚Ä¶More

name: Andy Katt
text: Quick, friendly service, family-friendly atmosphere.  The lunch pop had us wait for 15 minutes but really not bad. Pizza was tasty and beer glass was clean, not much more required.

name: Max Madill
text: Meal was only so so.  The BBQ pizza tasted like they poured maple syrup over it, yuck.  I had a meal with french fries and they only gave you a very skimpy serving of fries.  The ice in my ice tea melted  and no more ice was offered. ‚Ä¶More

name: Jackie Peterson
text: Came in with co workers and the service was exceptional. Celeste was our server, she definitely has an outstanding way of taking care of her tables. I highly recommend this server if you want the best experience. She gave us a tour of the ‚Ä¶More

name: Dmitri Shatove
text: To call this an overpriced junk food would be a compliment.  Small "build your own pie" smelling like a wet dog and  tasting like yucky over-salty seafood for  $28+tax.  'Curbside pickup' served on the 'smaller-order-longer-wait' basis serves as an insult on top of  the rip-off and near-puke sensation.  Truly awful.

name: Michael Holmes
text: Yum! Delicious food .. Clean .. Courteous staff

name: Shiva Mantri
text:
Amazing food and menu.

Order thin crust. Regular crust has too much crust. However you should order regular crust once to enjoy regular pizza. Flavorful pizzas.

name: Jen D
text: Went on the first day then again about 2 weeks later. So glad they opened up a MM that‚Äôs fairly close to me. Their pizza is always concise when it comes to taste (one of the best!) And on our last visit, the waitress kept us informed on ‚Ä¶More

name: Matt Snyder
text: Food was great, service was phenomenal. We had a pretty complicated order (we have different food allergies and all need something special) and when they made a mistake on one of our pizzas the chef remade it, at no cost, for us to take ‚Ä¶More

name: Jake McDowell
text: Great location, great staff and we love Thai dye pizza.  Pizza was so good forgot to take a picture. We had been to the now closed Rockville location and this location was way better.

name: Jason Stiles
text: I enjoyed the menu and drink options. The restaurant was clean and modern.   The staff were helpful and attentive. They were able to seat large parties.

name: jack casson
text: Go for the beer, stay for the company. Amy and Jeremiah are two of the most knowledgeable beer heads I‚Äôve ever met and it‚Äôs always a pleasure getting to shoot the **** with them. If you end up there ask Amy stuff about beer, she knows everything.

name: Sharon Smith
text: The gluten free pizza is good but the wings only had five small wings and were disappointing. The bar area is decent for watching sports but call ahead to make sure they can broadcast your game. While I couldn't have the soup the bowl was a nice size and my boyfriend said it was good. His Calzone was huge.

name: Matthew Stockhaus
text: Great pizza and service!

name: Doug Cash
text: This place has improved significantly since it opened.  The food is very good and the service is pretty good most of the time. It gets a little slow when they are super busy, but that's to be expected.

name: Joe Darden
text: The pizza is amazing, as is the craft beer draft selection. This is a new-ish location that is true to brand. ‚Ä¶More

name: Chris Mills
text: Fantastic food, and even better service. Milton took great care of me, and the kitchen manager even came out to talk through a custom order. 5-star service all around.

name: Jason Brooks
text: This place is awesome!  Super unique decor and food options.  The pizza is amazing and the staff is very nice.  My kids and I went there on a Sunday afternoon and enjoyed the outdoor eating area.  Our server was courteous, knowledgeable and pretty funny, too.  A++

name: Andre Wyche
text: What can I say. They don't make pizza; they good tasting food and they serve cold drinks to adults. They have a great place that includes children.

name: Justin Kydd
text: Excellent venue. Great food and delicious drinks. Customer service was pleasant as well!

name: Rachel Grover
text: It's a great atmosphere with awesome pizza! Can't go wrong.

name: Amanda Beylo
text: Fast service, even during the lunch rush. They will customize any order too!

name: Rishabh Sharma
text: Finished our meal few minutes ago, had really good pizza after a long time... more options for vegetarians and vegans.

name: Shishir Tandale
text: Pretty great restaurant, if I could boil my review down to a single sentence, here it is: ‚Ä¶More

name: Alejandra Granados Fuentes
text: Cool place and delicious good!

name: Kristin Ahearn
text: Awesome food, allergy friendly and great service. Bernice was a fantastic server and very accommodating to my family.

name: Jackie Kern-Wies
text: Have always loved Mellow and just moved to the area. Best one yet!

name: Nick Rich
text: I've been impressed by this place both times i've been. Waitstaff is attentive but not overbearing. Pizza is delicious.

name: Tania Sotillo
text: Loved our Kosmic Karma Pizza

name: Angelika Guy
text: Will always be my go-to for pizza and beer. So many craft beer choices and they change frequently. On my most recent visit they even had Maine Beer Company's Woods&Waters! Excellent and friendly service, too. Definitely one of my favorite places to go in NOVA.

name: What what?
text: The food is awesome 5/5! However service needs refining/additional training, not sure if some of the servers have too big of a section as some seemed frazzled and forgot things like drinks/silverware.

name: Russell Dunlap
text: Service was pretty darn slow when we went, but this may just have been a one time thing (first visit). When our server was around though, she was incredibly pleasant, we just only saw her 3-4 times for the about 90 we spent in the ‚Ä¶More

name: Herb r
text: Had the pretzels and build your own pizza. Both were very good

name: Kristina Barney
text: Such a fun and delicious pizza place! It was a nice change from the typical pizza joint. Nice atmosphere. My kids loved it!

name: Todd Bearrows
text: Bathrooms are gross, the pizza was good but I didnt think it was anything worth $20+ for a pizza

name: Adam Brodie
text: Clean and good food

name: Evelyn Foltz
text: Mmmmm, Mello Mushroom- The vegan pizza was extraordinary!

name: Sophia Garcia
text: Great pizza! Friendly staff and food is always fresh. Never a long wait for food. Located in a nice shopping area and easy to find.

name: Marius Dascalu
text: Amazing food. Loved the ambiance. Definitely coming back for more!

name: Anthony Jay
text: Not vegan friendly at all. I ordered a calzone. Firstly, it took quite a long time to be delivered. Secondly, it was brought to me and covered in butter. I talked to the server. They ended up remaking it. The remade item came in half the ‚Ä¶More

name: HoustonPrince
text: Nice ambience at the bar.  Pizza was great.   Mixed drinks were weak.

name: Chris D
text: It's your run of the mill restaurant that is more watering hole than dining destination. Loud and a little crowded, the wait staff seems to be able to keep up with the volume. Just nothing that makes this place really stand out.

name: Dan Galaviz
text: Once our company moves to this area, this will be my to go to place for lunch and dinner. I recommend that you try the Magic Mushroom Soup, one of the best tasting dishes on the menu. The wings are worthy of winning first place in a wing ‚Ä¶More

name: Cody Holt
text: Top notch pizza for a chain-type restaurant. Really great!

name: stonacious stone
text: Get the Pacific Rim. Hanna is the best waitress in the DC area. MM rocks!

name: Grace Be
text:
Good service
Free and plenty of parking in new shopping center
Generous topping portion but burnt the pizza ‚Ä¶More

name: Nate S
text: Wonderfully nice staff were very helpful in getting us set up with an outside table with our dogs and our friends. And while a lot of places might have left is forgotten outside, here I felt like we were always a point of focus for the serving staff.

name: Nicholas Tracy
text: Awesome pizza, great pretzel's.

name: Robert Grimes
text: Excellent food and great service. Can be a bit noisy during rush hour.

name: Katherine Doggett
text: Absolutely love coming to this restaurant.  Super friendly, without it feeling fake, and the service is excellent.  The speed for lunch is important and I enjoy going in and getting out in a timely manner.  In addition, they do gluten free and take pride in providing the service.  Never an issue! üëè

name: Trent Wakenight
text: Nothing special. I think the overall quality across all locations has diminished over the past five years.

name: Zahia Zeinoun
text: Different texture pizza dough and sweet but not bad. The place looks nice and modern. I gave it 3 stars because the food was ok.

name: Eric G
text: Shared the House Special with some coworkers. It was delightful, the crust actually has some substance to be able to pick it up unlike most pizza joints, and was flavorful as well. The ingredients seemed fresh.

name: Mouri F√≠del
text: The food is great and comes out quickly. Mixed drinks are great and don't taste watered down. The staff is great and check on you often. The happy hour drinks and munchies are chosen well. I'd definitely recommend this place for a sit down meal, especially for after work mixers.

name: Amit Jain
text: Tried it for the first time. I really liked it. The Yelp reviews kept me away, but I think it's worth a visit. Good beer and good pizza. Kid friendly. Not bad for an evening out.

name: Rama Iyer
text: Great tasting pizza and hoagies with vegetarian friendly options.

name: Mark Yeo
text: Great pizza and salads, love sitting at the bar, bartenders are always friendly

name: James Lytle
text: Good pizza and good beer.  Tried the mushroom pizza, and liked it a lot.  Also tried the wings which were also good.

name: Jay Fineberg
text: Pricey pizza.   However, I did enjoy it.

name: Christopher Hawkins
text: Great pizza great service!

name: Matt Miller
text: Always great pizza and fun atmosphere. You have to wait a bit for the pizza because they use spring water for the crust, but it's well worth the wait. The crust is crispy and perfect every time.

name: wonder boy
text: This is a go to for our family. Great food and beer selection. Kid friendly and helpful staff.

name: Kihong Kim
text: best place to go

name: Forest Platt
text: This is the third location we've visited.  Excellent service, and the great food we've come to expect from Mellow Mushroom.  Be sure to try the pretzel bites with beer cheese dipping sauce.

name: Peggy O'Brien
text: Fast service. Great server. Delicious pizza.

name: David Jones Jr
text: Great pizza. Great beer selection. Good service. The pacific rim is a jacked up Hawaiian pizza. In addition to ham and pineapple it has bacon and jalepenos. Just so so good. Honestly have never had anything but their pizza so can't comment on the rest of the menu but their pizza is perfect. Light airy crust, perfect amount of toppings.

name: james malone
text: The pizza was good, a small was enough for lunch and then dinner. I got a pretty boring cheese pizza the crust was really good I normally get thin, but since it was a first visit I tried the regular, you can't have a pizza chain for 40 ‚Ä¶More

name: Krystal White
text:
My calzone taste like they used old dough.
Calzone was flat and burnt.

name: Sarah F.
text: Amazing service each time we come.

name: Carleigh Vollbrecht
text: Staff made sure our gluten free pizza was prepared safely, it took a little longer, but was worth the wait.

name: Eric Botts
text: Absolutely excellent ingredients. Soft, slightly crispy dough. Veggie toppings are always fresh. They also have a bunch of tofu toppings (barbecue tofu, jerk tofu), which are delicious and great for vegetarians and vegans.

name: M. Herring
text: Clean, spacious and well staffed. No wait for seating and staff was very personable. Food was great and hot when delivered to the table. Protion size was generous for price. Definately a return visit is in order.

name: Brian Miller
text: Marvelous Mushroom! A pleasant surprise. The tie dye shirts belie the professionalism of the staff and chef. The Mushroom Soup is unique. Thick and tasteful, we want it for high end green bean casserole this Thanksgiving! The house special pizza is loaded, delicious, and filling. Highly recommend!!

name: cumaribates
text: Great beers, the mighty meary pizza is delicious!

name: Lory Cournoyer
text: The staff was very friendly & attentive, the food was delicious, and we had great seats to watch the game!  Tho, wish they were open until later (after 10pm), so we could have stayed until the end of the game.

name: Ian Sheesley
text: Showed up at the place on a monday to sit down and eat some pizza. Google says the place closes at 10pm at 9:02pm we arrived and they were closed.. confusing and disappointing

name: Gerard Thompson
text: Delicious pizza and an impressive beer selection.

name: Charles Sturdivant
text: Food was good, atmosphere is so so. Servers were very nice and attentive. I will definitely go back again.

name: Sureshkumar Ganesan
text: Mushroom pizzzaaa was awesome, veggie pizza was also good. üòãüòãüòã will surely try something else next time.

name: Tim Wick
text: So good. The pizza is better than you would guess, and we were expecting top notch. Classy staff who listen and pay attention. Hats off!

name: Micheal Pattock
text: First time eating here and its fantastic custom pizzas and a soup and other awesome stuff a must place to go give it a shot you'll never know till you try it.

name: Liz Jones
text: The pizza here is insanely good, and the staff are incredibly friendly.  The cocktails are also yummy and unique.  Will definitely be back - regularly üòÄ

name: Chris Grassmuck
text: Love a MM. This one lives up to the standards

name: Samuel Lee
text: Pizza had quality ingredients, was well cooked and much more filling than I anticipated.

name: Jeremy Roberts
text: Pizza was great as was the atmosphere. The staff as well. They have a great beer selection to wash it down with.

name: Chad Ray
text: Nice place with great food, can be a little slow on table turnover when crowded so you may have to wait a bit during typical busy restaurant times.

name: Don Wilber
text: Love the pizza and margaritas.  Service is decent.  Prices are fair.

name: salia samura
text: Great quality pizza and environment.

name: Berta aramayo
text: Excellent food and service. The musician Elliot Lane was great !!!

name: Monty Lowe
text: My favorite pizza place. Really wish they would bring back the Maui Wowi pizza... Best pizza ever.

name: Steven Decato
text: Always good pizza.  A nice mix of sports bar and pizzeria.  The hostess needs some training.

name: Michael Sherman
text: Excellent food and great atmosphere ~ Will definitely go back!!

name: Andrey Stepanoff
text: Great place! Good food! We'll definitely come back!!

name: O Becker
text: Live musician, great pizza, family fun

name: Casey James
text: Great service, large beer selection, and the ingredients in the pizza trasted great. The area is nice.

text: The meat pizza was too salty but other pizzas were good.

name: Michael B
text: The calzone was ok. Nothing special. A little expensive if you ask me.

name: Amanda Jolley
text: Great food and great service!

name: Sylvie Luanghy
text: Pizza was good

name: William Gulliford
text: Great food, great service. Will go back.

name: Tom Bennett
text: Frist time eating at the Mello the pizza was good they do have gluten free pizza crust available lots of beer choices must try it

name: Garrett Wood
text: Good food, waitress was polite and professional. Service was a little slower than I'd expect but overall good.

name: michael terner
text: Solid for a mall location. Could have used another bar tender on duty.

name: Marcus Marshall
text: The Pizza is phenomenal & the service is great as well. The bartenders make great drinks and the customer service is amazing also.

name: Thomas Donlan
text: Amazing, amazing amazing. If you haven't been here and like beer and pizza...go now...

name: Jason Hagen
text: I've never had anything bad from this place.  Great for gatherings!

name: Shanna Cummings
text: Delicious crust and amazing toppings! The Great White exploded with flavor!

name: Sarah Holmquist
text: Thanks for letting me know the system was down but I‚Äôm pretty sure your bartender knew that after I expressed my concerns/difficulties upon my arrival. I ordered pizza anyway and sat and waited (drinking 2 pints in the process). Well played ‚Ä¶More

name: Andrea Pickett
text: Fun place to have lunch and the food was really good.

name: Robert S
text: Pretty good spot, bit different vibe from the Herndon location.  Pizza is really good, though it kind of has its own style I haven't seen elsewhere.  Great selection of beers at fair prices.

name: Missy Haas
text: We have always had excellent service here. Pizza is great and so are the pretzel bites! Excellent craft beer selection.

name: Brandon Mazza
text: Claudia the catering coordinator is excellent. Highly recommend this place to anyone!

name: Javier Rivera
text: Very nice vibe and great servers

name: Mikki
text: Mellow Mushroom is great! I love that they serve the Prosecco in tiny bottles instead of just bringing out a tiny glass. More for your money. I love their Shiitake mushroom pizza. Rather large portion sizes for their pizza, as well. Don't try to get a medium if you're eating alone. You won't finish it.

name: M Switzer
text: Mushroom soup and pizza were very good.  Service was great!  I would definitely eat there again.

name: Warron French
text: Good food and service.

name: Roger Colon
text: Nice atmosphere and great service.  Our server was very attentive and pleasant. The pizza's were awesome. We'll definitely be coming back.

name: J Y
text: Great pizza! Great selection of beers and spirits. We have tried to find a nice Mom and Pop pizza around the NOVA area but have yet to find it after six months.  We are a bit spoiled having lived in NJ for the last couple of years, so we ‚Ä¶More

name: mylaswanson
text: Great happy hour specials and Wine Wednesday.

name: byron gibson
text: Been here a few times, the buffalo chicken pizza is my favorite!!!  The execution of the buffalo pizza doesn't seem very consistent though and it was especially bothersome yesterday.  Chicken is always of different sizes and yesterday the ‚Ä¶More

name: C Conrad
